sqlMap.statement: SELECT ROUTNAME AS "ROUTNAME", MOTIVROUTURINAME AS "MOTIVROUTURINAME" , NONMOTIVROUTURINAME AS "NONMOTIVROUTURINAME" , LAYERDSTCD AS "LAYERDSTCD" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIFR02 WHERE ROUTNAME= #routName#
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIFR02 SET MOTIVROUTURINAME = #motivRoutUriName#, NONMOTIVROUTURINAME = #nonMotivRoutUriName#, LAYERDSTCD = #layerDstcd# WHERE ROUTNAME = #routName#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIFR02 ( ROUTNAME, MOTIVROUTURINAME, NONMOTIVROUTURINAME, LAYERDSTCD) VALUES(#routName#, #motivRoutUriName#, #nonMotivRoutUriName#, #layerDstcd#)
